Text:
Adobe Reader is a tiny free application used to read epub formatted ebooks.

You can download the latest version from adobe http://get.adobe.com/reader/
I gave the wrong address. For the epub reader you need adobe editions at: http://www.adobe.com/products/digitaleditions/
thanks so much for these, i just knew I was going to have trouble finding 1 of the Secret Circle books and here all three are, along with a bunch of others I just have to read! Thanks again!!!
